key_features: Multi-Agent Research Pipeline with specialized AI agents
Parallel analysis of code structure, technical debt, and maintenance health
Smart repository discovery by keyword, URL, or owner/repo patterns
Agentic Interrogation Chat with ReAct agent
Live GitHub API integration for real-time data
Deep technical synthesis with production-grade reports

workflow: Code Analysis: Maps file tree and summarizes core logic files
Issue Intelligence: Evaluates recent issues and PRs
Trend/Risk Node: Analyzes commit frequency and star velocity
Senior Synthesis: Combines research into structured JSON report
architecture.unique_aspect: Tool-Calling Agent that fetches live GitHub data during conversations

purpose: Automated deep technical research on any public GitHub repository
